rules.text: Don't be a dick. - The universal rule
Slurs and hate speech are not tolerated.
Use CW tags for Gore and other NSFW posts.

Don't do anything that would cause another instance to defed (completely block) our instance. When I receive reports, I will take the steps necessary to resolve the remote grievance if I find it has merit, and I will reach out to you via DM to inform you of the decision I've made.
Observe Mastodon etiquette as best as we can. A majority of us are new to this network that has been around for many years and has its own culture.
No content that is considered illegal in the United States
No posting misinformation or misleading information.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
